pages.text: $(item)Redstone Transmitters/$ and $(item)Redstone Receivers/$ can wirelessly transmit redstone signals (including $(item)Circuitry/$ signals w/ decimal).$(br2)A Transmitter can be linked to one or more $(item)Receivers/$ with a $(item)Linking Tool/$ (a wrench for linking), which will output the redstone signal going into the $(item)Transmitter/$.
$(item)Wireless Transmitters/Receivers/$ can be right-clicked with dyes to color code them.
